title: Horae vacivae, or, Essays. Some occasionall considerations. By John Hall.
author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.
publisher: Printed by E.G. for J. Rothwell, at the Sun and Fountaine in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Recto of first leaf blank; verso has engraved portrait.
